articles.description: Rising British star Jack Draper will play top seed Rafael Nadal in the Australian Open first round, with Andy Murray also handed a tough draw.
articles.content:
Draper has climbed into the world's top 40 after being ranked outside the top 250 a year ago
Australian Open 2023

articles.title: Australia's human rights credibility undermined by domestic record, new report finds - ABC News
articles.description: Human Rights Watch highlights more Indigenous Australians died in custody last year than in 2021, and that new laws targeting climate protesters resulted in harsher penalties against activists.
